scripts.cap:sync: npm run build && npx cap sync
scripts.cap:run:android: npm run build && npx cap sync && npx cap run android
scripts.build:apk: npm run build && npx cap sync && cd android && gradlew assembleDebug
scripts.build:apk:release: npm run build && npx cap sync && cd android && gradlew assembleRelease
scripts.android: npm run build && npx cap sync && npx cap open android
